wikipedia_page.main: Paul Towndrow (born 13 December 1978) is a Scottish saxophonist, composer, arranger and educator. He won the Audience Prize at The 2003 World Saxophone Competition and is a member of Scotland’s flagship jazz orchestra, the Scotland National Jazz Orchestra.His 2009 album, Newology, attracted a four star review in The Guardian.
